import React, { Component } from 'react' class UserInfoForm extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { title:props.title, name:props.User.username, gender:props.User.gender, date: props.User.date, phoneNumber: props.User.phoneNumber, email: props.User.email, } } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({ [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } render() { return (

{this.state.title}
